item.title: OSCR Member: Georg Granic
item.description: Description My research interests lie in the intersection of Economics, Political Science, and Psychology. I am currently doing research on how incentives influence survey responses, how voting affects political preferences, and how to design just-in-time adaptive nudges. CV and Contact Info Click on the picture to send an email. The icons on the right redirect to the CV and social media pages.
